org.nise.ux.asl.run

Class ASLServer<D,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nise.ux.asl.run.ASLAutoConfigServiceServer<D,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - Type of <Data> being listened on <listening port>
    R - Type of <Response> to be sent toward service-client
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigHandler

    public class ASLServer<D,R>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigHandler
    This is the Main Constructor Class of this service library. To use this library create an instance of this class, then use start() to start the service
    Author:
    Yaser Eftekhari ( ^ - ^ )

        Parameters:
        serviceResponserFactory -
        • A Factory to produce new instances of interface ServiceResponser
        requestPackageType -
        • Use code below to create this parameter
          Type requestPackageType = new TypeToken<RequestPackage<MyClass>>(){}.getType();}
          • where MyClass will be equal to type D

      • refreshAll

        public void refreshAll()
        Re-Constructs or Destroys Service Threads based on numbers defined in configuration parameters
        • DISTRIBUTER_NO
        • REQUEST_ANALYZER_NO
        • RESPONSE_ANALYZER_NO
        • PROFILER_NO
        • RESPONSER_NO
        Specified by:
        refreshAll in interface ConfigHandler

      • refreshConfig

        public void refreshConfig(java.lang.String key,
                 java.lang.String config)
        Re-Constructs or Destroys Service Threads of given configuration parameter.
        Specified by:
        refreshConfig in interface ConfigHandler
        Parameters:
        key - name of configuration. This parameter can be one of values below:
        • REQUEST_FETCHER_NO
        • DISTRIBUTER_NO
        • REQUEST_ANALYZER_NO
        • RESPONSE_ANALYZER_NO
        • PROFILER_NO
        • RESPONSER_NO
        config - value of configuration
